title: Sketchbook Folio, "Landscape with Trees, Stream, and Possible Haystacks", 1885–1902
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster,
creditline: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
description: Grass in foreground with trees at left in middleground. At right, extending back, a river with grass along bank. On distant bank, a stand of trees at right curves with river out of sight.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Landscape with Trees, Stream, and Possible Haystacks", 1885–1902.
1885–1902. Graphite on cream wove paper. Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest. 1953-179-87-24.
